summary: Loraine the bandit leader, mention in the note found on the body of Thomas during the Bleak Falls Barrow quest, is brought to life in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zqSlMtP.png[/img][/center]

[color=yellow][b]About the mod[/b][/color]
When exploring Bleak Falls Barrow during the Golden Claw/Dragonstone quest, you come across a the body of Thomas near the troll (sometimes he is in the pit.) Thomas carries a note from a bandit leader named Loraine. You are not required to find the note, only complete the Bleak Falls Barrow quest. This mod brings Loraine into the Skyrim world.There are 2 quests with difficult battles in the second,so be careful and save often. The first quest is to find Loraine. This can be started anytime by talking to the bandit in the Sleeping Giant Inn, but I suggest you be at least level 10.

After finishing the second quest, she will become a unique and powerful ally. She has her own personality and has very few nice things to say about Skyrim or the people that live there. If you are a werewolf she will ridicule you and if a vampire, threaten you. Please read the FAQ below for answers to most questions.

[size=4][color=red][b]WARNING: This is an adult mod. It contains adult language and references. If this offends you, please leave without comment.[/b][/color][/size]

[color=yellow][b]Current Modder[/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9937690/?]ThatGuyYeah[/url]

[color=yellow][b]The Voice Actors[/b][/color]
Loraine voiced by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/6060652-seridicalup/]SeRidicaLup[/url]
Judar StrongArm and Thomas' ghost voiced by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/657187-riverk/]RiverK[/url]
Ulgar DeathBlade scarily brought to life by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/450952-greycoyote/]GreyCoyote[/url]

[color=yellow][b]Former Modders
[/b][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4545067/?]rhowington[/url]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/800173-subtanker/]subtanker[/url]

[b]Instalation[/b]
Use your favorite installer program or manually install.

[b]Uninstall[/b]
Same as above except you uninstall.

[b]FAQ[/b]
(Q) Does Loraine look like Ellen Paige?
(A) Who is Ellen Paige?

(Q) Why don't you have screenshots of Loraine in skimpy armor?
(A) I am so old I might have a heart attack.

(Q) Does her boobs bounce?
(A) Hey! I'm married.

(Q) Why doesn't the first quest have markers?
(A) If you cannot understand the clues, markers won't help. If you fast travel, remember "near" does not mean "in".

(Q) I can't find Thomas' body.
(A) You don't need to. The mod assumes that you did and starts anytime after finishing the Bleak Falls Barrow Golden Claw/Dragonstone quest. Just talk to the bandit in the Sleeping Giant Inn.

(Q) I followed Loraine and she just wanders around.
(A) She told you not to follow her. Make your own way to the next marker. She will meet you there.

(Q) I keep getting killed doing the second quest.
(A) Buff up milkdrinker.

(Q) I use EFF and Convenient Horses and she won't ride.
(A) We know and may patch that.

(Q) Will you add more dialogue.
(A) Yes

[b]Screenshots by[/b]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/6284636-republicofdavnation/]RepublicOfDavnation[/url]
Sandy Eden
